summary: Bavaria is a large state in southeast Germany, with over 13 million people. Its capital, Munich, is Germany's third-largest city. The region has a rich history, dating back to Celtic tribes and Roman rule. It became a duchy in the 6th century and later joined the Holy Roman Empire. Bavaria has its own unique culture, heavily influenced by Catholicism, with its own language, food, and traditions. It's also very wealthy and has the second-biggest economy of all German states.
title: Bavaria
